entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or snow this evening then to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
